title: Python
content: If Javascript wasn't there then it would be my favorite language, ofcourse it is also my first ever programming language.

title: JavaScript
content: JavaScript is my favorite programming language. I feel very comfortable when it comes to working with JavaScript.

title: Django
content: It is very handy, organized, and an advanced framework. I mostly prefer Django over other for e-commerce sites.

title: React
content: The creation of Facebook is  amazing and very good choice for frontend stuff, ofcourse I am talking about react.

title: MongoDB
content: MongoDB is My favorite database because of its syntax  which is similar to JS.

title: Redux Toolkit
content: Redux Toolkit is a very beautiful library for state management. It helps a lot while dealing with complex states.
